title: Palindrome Permutation
content:
Given a string s, return true if a permutation of the string could form a palindrome and false otherwise.

 

Example 1:

Input: s = "code"
Output: false

Example 2:

Input: s = "aab"
Output: true

Example 3:

Input: s = "carerac"
Output: true

 

Constraints:

  • 1 <= s.length <= 5000
  • s consists of only lowercase English letters.
